channel.title: Changing Resolution of Whonix guest on Windows 7 host
channel.description:
Hi!
I see there has been an increase in the minimum password length here on Whonix forum. That is very good ;)
Regarding my question i was wondering if it is possible to increase the screen size of the Whonix guest on a Windows 7 host machine to 1440x900 without the need to install the Guest Additions.
Regards kambodscha1967

item.title: Changing Resolution of Whonix guest on Windows 7 host
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Check out https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Higher_Screen_Resolution - maybe that helps.

Read full topic
item.source: Changing Resolution of Whonix guest on Windows 7 host
